resources.string: 1. Ensure that this device is set to \"Allow mock locations\" under Settings -> Applications -> Development.
2. Under X-Plane Settings -> Net Connections -> Data, configure X-Plane to broadcast to %s:49000.
3. Under X-Plane Settings -> Data Input & Output, activate the following items for \"Internet via UDP\" by checking the leftmost box:
4. Set the Paused/Active button to Active. This starts a background Service to keep data flowing while you switch to another application.
This device must be set to \"Allow mock locations\" under Settings -> Applications -> Development.\n\nOnce this is done, return to X-Plane to GPS.
X-Plane to GPS is listening for data from X-Plane.
Enter the IP address to forward packets to:
